alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 5:31PM CDT until July 10 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: The National Weather Service in Green Bay has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Vilas County in north central Wisconsin... Northern Oneida County in north central Wisconsin... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 531 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Willow Reservoir, or 18 miles northwest of Rhinelander, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Newbold and Rainbow Flowage around 550 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Crystal Lake Scout Reservation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
